Title: Code Injection
Description: Remote Code Execution Vulnerability in shopware.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.2.0 before 4.3.0, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.2.25
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.2.0, all versions starting from 4.3.0 before 5.0.0, all versions starting from 5.2.25
